sentence: (Tom Williams/Pool via REUTERS) "They tried to link me to a Christian nationalist movement and even though they'd asked me about that, and I said, No, I certainly am not aligned with them which has racist overtones.'
title: Rep. Vicky Hartzler slams Kansas City Star attacking her faith: 'Tried to make me look like a radical'
